frontMatter.title: Storage Adapters
frontMatter.label: Storage Adapters
frontMatter.desc: Payload provides additional storage adapters to handle file uploads. These adapters allow you to store files in different locations, such as Amazon S3, Vercel Blob Storage, Google Cloud Storage, Uploadthing, and more.
frontMatter.keywords: uploads, images, media, storage, adapters, s3, vercel, google cloud, azure
